int64_t ShardKvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  Log_info("Ret at server is %d", ret);
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int ShardKvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    
 // std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx_);
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  uint64_t index = -1;
  uint64_t term = -1;
  RaftServer &rs= GetRaftServer();
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd(s);
  bool timeout=false;
  Log_info("Server ID %d Is leader: %s current term is %d", rs.loc_id_, rs.currentState.c_str(), rs.currentTerm);
  if (rs.currentState!="leader"){
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  putCommit=false;
  rs.Start(cmd,&index, &term);
  Coroutine::Sleep(550000);


  if(putCommit==false){


    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  // kvmap[k]=v;
  return KV_SUCCESS;

}

int ShardKvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    //  std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx_);
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  uint64_t index = -1;
  uint64_t term = -1;
  RaftServer &rs= GetRaftServer();
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = s;
  if (rs.currentState!="leader"){
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  appendCommit=false;
  rs.Start(cmd,&index, &term);
  Coroutine::Sleep(550000);


  if(appendCommit==false){
   return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  // kvmap[k]+=v;
  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int ShardKvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
      //std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx_);
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  uint64_t index = -1;
  uint64_t term = -1;
  RaftServer &rs= GetRaftServer();
  Log_info("Server ID %d Is leader: %s", rs.loc_id_, rs.currentState.c_str());
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = s;
  if (rs.currentState!="leader"){
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  getCommit=false;
  rs.Start(cmd,&index, &term);
  Coroutine::Sleep(550000);
 
  *v=kvmap[k];
  if(getCommit==false){
   return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

void ShardKvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
   //  std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx_);
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
  if(v->data_[1]=="put"){
    putCommit=true;
    kvmap[v->data_[2]]=v->data_[3];
  }
  if(v->data_[1]=="append"){
    appendCommit=true;
    kvmap[v->data_[2]]+=v->data_[3];
  }
  if(v->data_[1]=="get"){
    getCommit=true;
  }
  // Log_info("On next command called");
}

shared_ptr<ShardKvClient> ShardKvServer::CreateClient(Communicator* comm) {
  auto cli = make_shared<ShardKvClient>();
  cli->commo_ = comm;
  verify(cli->commo_ != nullptr);
  static uint32_t id = 0;
  id++;
  cli->cli_id_ = id; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
